all of creation

God infinite Supreme intelligence Divine

describe or explain what can only be

the particular and incomparableness of

the Peerless being that God in her

individual beings in personal

it is God's Divine will expressing

it is divine magnificence infinitely and

form

that all is enclosed in a limitless or

the field of conscious awareness in

existence
without exaggeration I can assert that

fully consciously aware of the minutest

there is no separation from the Oneness
that is
allow yourselves to accept that truth

the miracle of your beingness is

in human terms it is indeed astounding
just accept that whatever God chooses to

it appears to you that your human form
